author: ate
msg: JS2-1018: Release 2.2.0 preparation for j2-admin
See: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/JS2-1018
- add required NOTICE and LICENSE file
/pom.xml:
- adjust parent pom to portals-pom-1.2
- drop not neede xml-apis dependency (Java5 standard)
- configure maven-remote-resources-plugin to insert required NOTICE and LICENSE file in produced war
- disable generation of -sources archive (incorrect handling by maven-source-plugin)
- add "rat" profile for rat-maven-plugin configuration to verify required ASF src headers (mvn verify -P rat)
- add "apache-release" profile for assembling required ASF source distribution using custom assembly
- fix incorrect scm tag urls
/src/*:
- relocate webapp folder under src/main as being standard so no override configuration needed in /pom.xml
- add rat detected missing ASF headers
- fix spelling class PrincipaDataProvider -> PrincipalDataProvider
- add src/main/webapp/META-INF/SLF4J-LICENSE as required for redistribution
- add src/main/assembly/project-src.xml for building the ASF source distribution
/xdocs:
- drop (empty) xdocs, these will be provided through/with main Jetspeed itself

author: adrianc
msg: Applied fix from trunk for revision: 775667.

author: jm
msg: be smarter about extracting usernames

msg: JCR-2119: Method to create default RepositoryConfig from just the repository directory
